text: “Our flag does not fly because the wind moves it. It flies with the last breath of each soldier who died protecting it.” http

We owe our eternal gratitude to countless Americans who’ve come before us to serve their nation – many of whom gave their lives for their fellow countrymen. To our veterans & those serving in our Armed Forces: our flag flies high because of men and women like you. Thank you.

It was a privilege to join the Community Military Appreciation Committee at Fort Vancouver today as we honor and remember all the men and women who’ve donned the uniform answered the call of duty to protect our nation and its people – and never came home. http
